EmailTemplate.name: RE: update (1316538683.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: update (1316538683.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Ed,
I haven’t heard anything back from Maria since I emailed her on Thursday evening. Jason emailed me yesterday asking for a status update and I told him the situation and he said he would ask the vendor team what the progress what if any, but at this point unless someone higher up in the organization is looking at the agreement I don’t think anything will move forward with them.
I will reach out again today to see if there is any update and let you know.
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Ed [mailto:EZavada@mchsi.com] Sent: Tuesday, September 20, 2011 12:50 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: FW: update
Are the negotiations a bust or is MBO attempting to tried another avenue?
Ed Zavada Home: 319.373.3046 Cell: 319.389.0553
From: Jason Herman 7152 [mailto:JHerman@roseint.com] Sent: Monday, September 19, 2011 3:47 PM To: ezavada@mchsi.com Subject: update
Ed – It appears that MBO does not want to adhere to our MSA, and therefore we will not be able to work with them. We still have the option of working with you on W2. Please let me know your thoughts.
Jason Herman Resource Manager/Technical Recruiter Rose International, Inc. Phone: (888) 443-7673 x7152 Fax: 636-812-0076 jherman@roseit.com www.roseint.com
